April 28, 1967
Mr. Jerrold Sandler
1346 Connecticut Avenue N. W.
Washington, D. C. 20036
Dear Jerrold:
Enclosed you will find a copy of the letter I sent
Mrs. Edward F. Ryan, Legislation Chairman, on
March 10, 1967.
Also enclosed, you will find Mrs. Ryan's statement
in Support of S. 1160, The Public Television Act of 1967,
which she presented to the Senate Committee on Commerce,
April 28, 1967.
You will note that Mrs. Ryan strongly indicates the
interest of National PTA in Educational Radio as well as
Educational T V in her presentation.
We hope the efforts of PTA in this regard may prove to
be helpful in Educational Radio's rise to prominence in the
area of public education.
Sincerely,
Milton R. Litterst, Ed.D.
Vice-President, NCPT
MRLrma
Enclosures
